settings.title: Athletics at Green Valley is an integral part of the total high school program. Students have the opportunity to participate in a wide variety of activities that will enhance their educational experience.

settings.title: Green Valley participates in the Independent School League (ISL), which consists of 16 schools of approximately the same size and athletic strength. Our school has professional teams in various games at National level.

settings.title: In order to participate in a team, students need to pass a physical examination. Letter of certification is awarded to successful candidates.

settings.title: Athletics keeps us healthy, gets us up and running around. It also gives you an opportunity to meet a lot of different people, which is very important.

Green Valley is fortunate to have World's best coaches on field.
They work hard to deliver professional players.
